text: Requena is an airstrip serving the Tapiche River town of Requena in the Loreto Region of Peru. The runway also serves as a street, and is lined with houses on its west side. ==See also== * * *Transport in Peru *List of airports in Peru ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Requena *OurAirports - Requena *SkyVector - Requena * Category:Airports in Peru Category:Buildings and structures in Loreto Region
title: Requena Airport
